name: Spiritual Kung Fu
actor: Jackie Chan, Chih-Ping Chiang, Hsiu-yi Fang, Hong Hsu
description: Jackie Chan plays the part of the class clown in a shaolin temple whose deadliest secret is stolen. All is lost until Jackie's character discovers the dancing blue ghosts with bright red hair who haunt the library.

name: Almost Mercy
actor: Kane Hodder, Bill Moseley, Danielle Guldin, Allie Marshall
description: Jackson and Emily aren't like the other kids. Two burgeoning sociopaths on the brink of total meltdown. Ticking time bombs seeking revenge. Who will unravel first?

name: Light Years Away
actor: Trevor Howard, Mick Ford, Bernice Stegers, Henri Virlojeux
description: A young drifter meets up with a strange old man who claims that he has been taught to fly by birds.

name: The Idolmaker
actor: Ray Sharkey, Tovah Feldshuh, Peter Gallagher, Paul Land
description: Based on the life of rock promoter/producer Bob Marcucci, who discovered, among others, Frankie Avalon and Fabian.

name: Seems Like Old Times
actor: Goldie Hawn, Chevy Chase, Charles Grodin, Robert Guillaume
description: Writer Nick Gardenia is kidnapped from his California cliffhouse and forced to rob a bank. Now a fugitive, he seeks help from his ex, Glenda. She is a public defender remarried to a prosecutor, and we get a houseful of hijinks.

name: Charlie Chan and the Curse of the Dragon Queen
actor: Peter Ustinov, Lee Grant, Angie Dickinson, Richard Hatch
description: Famous detective Charlie Chan is called out of retirement to help a San Francisco detective solve a mysterious series of murders. With his bumbling grandson as his sidekick, Chan also encounters an old nemesis known as the Dragon Queen who is the prime suspect.

name: Copper Mountain
actor: Jim Carrey, Alan Thicke, Richard Gautier, Ziggy Lorenc
description: Two friends travel to a ski resort, with one looking to hit the slopes, while the other spends time trying to pick up women.

name: Sans Soleil
actor: Florence Delay, Arielle Dombasle, Riyoko Ikeda, Charlotte Kerr
description: "He wrote me...." A woman narrates the thoughts of a world traveler, meditations on time and memory expressed in words and images from places as far-flung as Japan, Guinea-Bissau, Iceland, and San Francisco.

name: The Sword and the Sorcerer
actor: Lee Horsley, Kathleen Beller, Simon MacCorkindale, George Maharis
description: A mercenary with a three-bladed sword rediscovers his royal heritage's dangerous future when he is recruited to help a princess foil the designs of a brutal tyrant and a powerful sorcerer in conquering a land.

name: Dr. Otto and the Riddle of the Gloom Beam
actor: Jim Varney, Glenn Petach, Myke R. Mueller, Jackie Welch
description: Dr. Otto grows a hand out of the top of his head and tries to destroy the world.

name: Gorky Park
actor: William Hurt, Lee Marvin, Brian Dennehy, Ian Bannen
description: An investigator on the Moscow police force relentlessly pursues the solution to a triple homicide which occurred in Moscow's Gorky Park. He finds that no one really wants him to solve the crime because it is just the tip of a complex conspiracy which involves the highest levels of the Moscow city government.

name: Last Night at the Alamo
actor: Sonny Carl Davis, Lou Perryman, Steven Mattila, Tina-Bess Hubbard
description: The cheerless events on the last night in the existence of a little suburban Houston pub. It has to be closed down for development reasons but one of the regular customers, Cowboy, seems to have friends in high places.

name: Le marginal
actor: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Henry Silva, Carlos Sotto Mayor, Pierre Vernier
description: The story is about Commissioner Jordan who arrives in Marseille to combat drug trafficking activities in his own unique way.

name: Sahara
actor: Brooke Shields, Lambert Wilson, Horst Buchholz, John Rhys-Davies
description: After her father dies, young Dale takes his place in a trans-African auto race, but ends up being abducted by a desert sheik.

name: Blood Suckers from Outer Space
actor: Robert Bradeen, Big John Brigham, Glen Coburn, Franny Coppenbarger
description: Farmers in Texas become brainwashed bloodsuckers.

name: Running Hot
actor: Monica Carrico, Eric Stoltz, Stuart Margolin, Virgil Frye
description: A teenager, wrongly convicted and sentenced to death for the murder of his father, escapes from jail. He hooks up with a prostitute and they take to the road to find the real killer of his father.

name: Shake!: Otis at Monterey
actor: Otis Redding, Booker T. & the M.G.s, Steve Cropper, Donald Dunn
description: Documentary on Otis Redding's performance at the 1967 Monterey Pop Festival.

name: Crystal Heart
actor: Lee Curreri, Tawny Kitaen, Lloyd Bochner, May Heatherly
description: A 22 year old man who has lived inside a crystal room because of a rare illness, meets an up and coming rock star, and the two fall in love.

name: Dazed and Confused
actor: Jason London, Joey Lauren Adams, Milla Jovovich, Shawn Andrews
description: It's the last day of school at a high school in a small town in Texas in 1976. The upperclassmen are hazing the incoming freshmen, and everyone is trying to get stoned, drunk, or laid, even the football players that signed a pledge not to.

name: Dreamchild
actor: Coral Browne, Ian Holm, Peter Gallagher, Caris Corfman
description: Exploring the somewhat darker and more mysterious side of the Lewis Carroll's classic book, the movie follows Alice Liddell (the book's inspiration) as an old woman who is haunted by the characters she was once so amused by. As she thinks back on it, she starts to see her relationship with the shy author/professor in a new way and realizes the vast change between the young Alice and the old.

name: King David
actor: Richard Gere, Edward Woodward, Alice Krige, Denis Quilley
description: This is a movie about the life of Israel's king David.

name: Mala Noche
actor: Tim Streeter, Doug Cooeyate, Ray Monge, Nyla McCarthy
description: A story of amour fou. Walt is madly in love/lust with a young illegal Mexican immigrant. However, the object of his unrequited affection doesn't even speak any English and finds Walt really strange and undesirable.

name: The Statue of Liberty
actor: James Baldwin, Tucker Burr, Ray Charles, Mario Cuomo
description: Documentary showing the history of the world-famous Statue of Liberty in New York harbor.

name: Born American
actor: Mike Norris, Steve Durham, David Coburn, Thalmus Rasulala
description: Three American students vacationing in Finland, cross the border into Russia for fun of it. When they are spotted by the Russian soldiers who are shooting to kill, it's not fun anymore. Captured and thrown in jail, they find it's not fun either. It's a nightmare.

name: Nomads
actor: Pierce Brosnan, Lesley-Anne Down, Anna Maria Monticelli, Adam Ant
description: A French anthropologist gets murdered in Los Angeles after he discovers the existence of some unknown demonical creatures. Before he dies, he reveals his secret to a young doctor...

name: Rita, Sue and Bob Too!
actor: Michelle Holmes, Siobhan Finneran, George Costigan, Lesley Sharp
description: Realistic story of working class Yorkshire life. Two schoolgirls have a sexual fling with a married man. Serious and light-hearted by turns.

name: Five Corners
actor: Jodie Foster, Tim Robbins, Todd Graff, John Turturro
description: A psychotic young man returns to his old neighborhood after release from prison. He seeks out the woman he previously tried to rape and the man who protected her, with twisted ideas of love for her and hate for him.

name: Hansel and Gretel
actor: David Warner, Hugh Pollard, Nicola Stapleton, Emily Richard
description: Based on the fairy tale by The Brothers Grimm. Hansel and Gretel are trapped in the deceptively decorated house of the witch Griselda who wishes to fatten Hansel so that he may be baked into a delicious gingerbread treat.

name: Critters 2
actor: Terrence Mann, Don Keith Opper, Cynthia Garris, Scott Grimes
description: A batch of unhatched critter eggs are mistaken for Easter eggs by the country-folk inhabitants of Grover's Bend and, before long, the ferocious furballs are on the rampage again.

name: The Accidental Tourist
actor: William Hurt, Kathleen Turner, Geena Davis, Amy Wright
description: After the death of his son, Macon Leary, a travel writer, seems to be sleep walking through life. Macon's wife, seems to be having trouble too, and thinks it would be best if the two would just split up. After the break up, Macon meets a strange outgoing woman, who seems to bring him back down to earth. After starting a relationship with the outgoing woman, Macon's wife seems to think that their marriage is still worth a try. Macon is then forced to deal many decisions

name: The Telephone
actor: Whoopi Goldberg, Severn Darden, Elliott Gould, John Heard
description: A crazy out of work actress, Vashti Blue, spends all her time in her small apartment with her pet owl and her telephone, which she uses to try and solve all her problems with life.

name: Bloodfist
actor: Don 'The Dragon' Wilson, Joe Mari Avellana, Rob Kaman, Billy Blanks
description: Don Wilson plays retired kickboxer Jake Raye, who travels to Manila, where his brother is favored to win a kickboxing competition. His brother is killed, and Jake realizes he must enter the competition himself to flush out his brother's killer.

name: Spontaneous Combustion
actor: Brad Dourif, Cynthia Bain, Jon Cypher, William Prince
description: A young man finds out that his parents had been used in an atomic-weapons experiment shortly before he was born, and that the results have had some unexpected effects on him.

name: Chattahoochee
actor: Gary Oldman, Dennis Hopper, Frances McDormand, Pamela Reed
description: An American war hero attempts suicide and ends up in Chattahoochee State Mental Hospital. But he realizes that the doctors in the hospital are humiliating patients, and staff are murdering them.

name: A Cry in the Wild
actor: Jared Rushton, Pamela Sue Martin, Stephen Meadows, Ned Beatty
description: 13-year-old Brian is the sole survivor of an unreported plane crash. Alone in the Yukon wilderness, Brian must learn to survive by his wits, find food and shelter, and brave wild, hungry animals until or if he is found.

name: Fear
actor: Ally Sheedy, Lauren Hutton, Michael O'Keefe, Stan Shaw
description: Psychic Cayce Bridges helps police solve murders by mentally linking with the murderer. Then she discovers a murderer with the same talent - who wants to share the fear of his victims with her.

name: The Frontier
actor: Jocelin Donahue, Kelly Lynch, Jim Beaver, Izabella Miko
description: Laine, a young woman on the run from the law, turns up at the Frontier, an isolated desert diner and motel. She is offered a job by Luanne, the owner, and, hoping to lose herself in the obscurity of the place, accepts the job. But soon Laine realizes she has stumbled into an even bigger and more dangerous situation.

name: Laser Mission
actor: Ernest Borgnine, Graham Clarke, Richard Cox, Gerry de Somma
description: Mercenary Gold is sent from the CIA to seize the laser expert Braun in Cuba, before the KGB catches him. A recently stolen giant diamond could be used together with Braun's knowledge to construct a laser cannon which could bring power over the whole world. Who will succeed: CIA or KGB - or none of them?

name: Mindwarp
actor: Bruce Campbell, Angus Scrimm, Marta Martin, Elizabeth Kent
description: A young woman in a post-apocolyptic world rebels against the status quo, in which everyone lives their lives out in a virtual reality fantasy world of their own choosing... With consequences she couldn't have imagined.

name: The Neverending Story II: The Next Chapter
actor: Jonathan Brandis, Kenny Morrison, Clarissa Burt, John Wesley Shipp
description: Once again, Bastian is transported to the world of Fantasia which he recently managed to save from destruction. However, the land is now being destroyed by an evil sorceress, Xayide, so he must join up with Atreyu and face the Emptiness once more.

name: Shadowzone
actor: Louise Fletcher, David Beecroft, James Hong, Frederick Flynn
description: After someone is killed in the subterranean project called "Shadowzone," a NASA captain is called in to investigate. In the project, sleeping subjects are induced into a deep EDS state whereby they become portals to a parallel universe. Unfortunately this causes adverse reactions in the subject, and something gets through the portal, the consequence of which is an attrition problem.

name: War of the Birds
actor: Sofie Bredesen, Vigga Bro, Lisbet Dahl, Pernille Hansen
description: An owl, two sparrows, a dove and a pair of would-be aviator mice join forces to fight against an evil bird of prey who threatens the peace in their lovely forest.

name: Into the Badlands
actor: Bruce Dern, Mariel Hemingway, Helen Hunt, Dylan McDermott
description: A bounty hunter searches the west for a wanted outlaw named Red Roundtree.

name: Center Stage
actor: Maggie Cheung, Han Chin, Tony Ka Fai Leung, Carina Lau
description: Biopic of 1930's Chinese actress Ruan Ling Yu.

name: Shout
actor: John Travolta, Jamie Walters, Heather Graham, Richard Jordan
description: A new music teacher in a 1955 West Texas home for wayward boys brings new vision and hope for many of the interned boys.

name: Sixty Six
actor: Charlie Clark, Nick Shirm, Thomas Drewson, Gregg Sulkin
description: A boy's barmitzvah looks set to be a disaster when it coincides with the 1966 World Cup Final.

name: Lessons of Darkness
actor: Werner Herzog
description: This film shows the disaster of the Kuwaitian oil fields in flames, with few interviews and no explanatory narration. Hell itself is presented in such beautiful sights and music that one has to be fascinated by it.

name: Miss Rose White
actor: Maximilian Schell, Kyra Sedgwick, Maureen Stapleton, Bari Biern
description: Sister given up by Italian family only to be reunited 22 years later.

name: Dirt! The Movie
director: Bill Benenson, Gene Rosow, Eleonore Dailly
actor: Jamie Lee Curtis, Bill Logan, Vandana Shiva, Fritjof Capra
description: A look at man's relationship with Dirt. Dirt and humans couldn't be closer. We started our journey together as stardust, swirled by cosmic forces into our galaxy, solar system, and planet. We are made of the same stuff. Four billion years of evolution created dirt as the living source of all life on Earth including humans. Dirt has given us food, shelter, fuel, medicine, ceramics, flowers, cosmetics and color --everything needed for our survival. For most of the last ten thousand years we humans understood our intimate bond with dirt and the rest of nature. We took care of the soils that took care of us. But, over time, we lost that connection. Our species became greedy and careless. We still depend on dirt, but now we abuse and ignore it. We are destroying our last natural resource with our agriculture, our mining, and our paving over the planet for cities. We turned dirt into something "dirty." In doing so, we transform the skin of the earth into a hellish and dangerous landscape for all life on earth. A millennial shift in consciousness about the environment offers a beacon of hope - and practical solutions. Around the globe, pioneers are coming together to save earth's last natural resource. Tiny villages rise up to battle giant corporations slaughtering their land. Scientists discover connections with soil that can balance global warming. Generation X brands organic farming as trendy and children begin to eat from edible school yards. Inmates find inner peace and job skills in a prison horticulture program. Medical researchers explore dirt's capacity to provide solutions to such devastating health crises as AIDS. Major religions are rediscovering the reverence for the natural world that unites them all. Uses animation, vignettes, personal accounts and story telling.

name: My New Gun
actor: Diane Lane, James Le Gros, Stephen Collins, Tess Harper
description: Debbie and Gerald's lives drastically change after they get a gun. Their mysterious neighbor, Skippy, becomes and important and transforming figure in their lives.

name: Sarafina!
actor: Leleti Khumalo, Whoopi Goldberg, Miriam Makeba, John Kani
description: South African teenagers fight against apartheid in the Soweto Uprising.

name: Seedpeople
actor: Sam Hennings, Andrea Roth, Dane Witherspoon, Bernard Kates
description: The sleepy little town of Comet Valley has been invaded by plants from outer space. Intent on taking over the Earth, the space plants have found a way to pollinate humans, thus turning them into walking seed carriers. Can the resourceful residents fight off the alien invaders, or is the planet doomed to become an alien garden?

name: The Doe Boy
actor: James Duval, Kevin Anderson, Andrew J. Ferchland, Jeri Arredondo
description: A Cherokee boy is a haemophiliac in a culture obsessed with blood identity.

name: Closer to God
actor: Jeremy Childs, Shelean Newman, Shannon Hoppe, David Alford
description: A genetic scientist successfully clones the first human being, a baby girl named Elizabeth, but his work is soon threatened by a dark secret, a secret that threatens to destroy everything and everyone precious to him.

name: Body Melt
actor: Gerard Kennedy, Andrew Daddo, Ian Smith, Regina Gaigalas
description: Residents of peaceful Pebbles Court, Homesville, are being used unknowingly as test experiments for a new 'Body Drug' that causes rapid body decomposition (melting skin etc.) and painful death.

name: Father Hood
actor: Patrick Swayze, Halle Berry, Sabrina Lloyd, Brian Bonsall
description: A deadbeat dad kidnaps his kids from the bus. Based on the true life stories and experiences of Michael J. Hardy.

name: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday
actor: John D. LeMay, Kari Keegan, Kane Hodder, Steven Williams
description: The secret of Jason's evil is revealed. It is up to the last remaining descendant of the Voorhees family to stop Jason before he becomes immortal and unstoppable. This is the final (?) battle to end Jason's reign of terror forever.

name: The Meteor Man
actor: Robert Townsend, Marla Gibbs, Eddie Griffin, Robert Guillaume
description: One night Jefferson Reed gets hit in the chest by a souped-up chunk of meteor. So he can fly, but he's scared of heights. He can master the information in any book ... for about fifteen minutes. Now his friends and family want him to protect their community from the dreaded Golden Lords.

name: A Perfect World
actor: Kevin Costner, Clint Eastwood, Laura Dern, T.J. Lowther
description: After escaping from a Huntsville prison, convict Butch Haynes and his partner Terry Pugh kidnap a young boy, Philip Perry, and flee across Texas. As they travel together, Butch and Philip discover common bonds and suffer the abuses of the outside "Perfect World." In pursuit is Texas Ranger "Red" Garnett and criminologist Sally Gerber.

name: The Silver Brumby
actor: Caroline Goodall, Russell Crowe, Amiel Daemion, Johnny Raaen
description: A mother tells her daughter a fable about the prince of the brumbies, brumby being a term for the feral horses of Australia, who must find its place among its kind, while one man makes it his mission to capture it and tame it.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III
actor: Elias Koteas, Paige Turco, Stuart Wilson, Sab Shimono
description: The four turtles travel back in time to the days of the legendary and deadly samurai in ancient Japan, where they train to perfect the art of becoming one. The turtles also assist a small village in an uprising.

name: Night Terrors
actor: Robert Englund, Zoe Trilling, Alona Kimhi, Juliano Mer-Khamis
description: A young girl travels to Cairo to visit her father, and becomes unwillingly involved with a bizarre sadomasochistic cult led by the charismatic Paul Chevalier, who is a descendant of the Marquis de Sade.

name: Getting Out
actor: Rebecca De Mornay, Robert Knepper, Carol Mitchell-leon, Richard Jenkins
description: A woman has to put her life back together after getting out of prison.

name: Heavenly Creatures
actor: Melanie Lynskey, Kate Winslet, Sarah Peirse, Diana Kent
description: Based on the true story of Juliet Hulme and Pauline Parker, two close friends who share a love of fantasy and literature, who conspire to kill Pauline's mother when she tries to end the girls' intense and obsessive relationship.

name: Let Me Make You a Martyr
actor: Niko Nicotera, Sam Quartin, Mark Boone Junior, Marilyn Manson
description: A cerebral revenge film about two adopted siblings who fall in love, and hatch a plan to kill their abusive father.

name: Speechless
actor: Michael Keaton, Geena Davis, Christopher Reeve, Bonnie Bedelia
description: Two political speechwriters fall in love before they find out they are working for candidates on opposite sides.

name: The Club
actor: Jack Thompson, Graham Kennedy, Frank Wilson, Harold Hopkins
description: Boardroom and dressing-room intrigues spill on to the field at the Australian Rules football club.

name: My Teacher's Wife
actor: Jason London, Alexondra Lee, Zak Orth, Leslie Lyles
description: A highly sexed high-school student with insufficient grades thinks the gods are smiling on him when he meets a sexy maths tutor who is also his maths teacher's wife.

name: Steep
actor: Ingrid Backstrom, Anselme Baud, Bill Briggs, Doug Coombs
description: Steep traces the legacy of extreme skiing from its early pioneers to the daredevils of today.

name: Fair Game
actor: William Baldwin, Cindy Crawford, Steven Berkoff, Christopher McDonald
description: Max Kirkpatrick is a cop who protects Kate McQuean, a civil law attorney, from a renegade KGB team out to terminate her.

name: Zeisters
actor: Mark Alfred, Joan Allen, Ted Bardi, Craig Barnett
description: Two brothers befriend an escaped mental patient "the fat guy") and accompany him on his misadventures in the big city.

name: Frank and Ollie
actor: Frank Thomas, Ollie Johnston, Sylvia Roemer, John Canemaker
description: A documentary about two famed Disney animators, Frank and Ollie.

name: The Legend of Bigfoot
actor: Ivan Marx, Peggy Marx, Yukon Frida
description: A documentary about the legendary creature, Bigfoot, with emphasis on him being the missing link.

name: The Night Before Christmas
actor: Terence Hill, Bud Spencer, Boots Southerland, Ruth Buzzi
description: Two brothers who hate themselves are going to spend Christmas with their mother. She tries to get them together.

name: Shark Zone
actor: Dean Cochran, Alan Austin, Brandi Sherwood, Velizar Binev
description: A man must hunt down ferocious sharks that are threatening a small beach community.

name: Wings of Courage
actor: Craig Sheffer, Elizabeth McGovern, Tom Hulce, Val Kilmer
description: In 1920's South America a small group of French pilots struggle to prove they can offer a reliable airmail service over the Andes. When one of the young pilots crashes on such a flight he has to try and get back to civilization on foot. Back home, his wife and colleagues start to fear the worst.

name: Breaking the Surface: The Greg Louganis Story
actor: Mario Lopez, Michael Murphy, Jeffrey Meek, Rosemary Dunsmore
description: Breaking the Surface is about the tough times Greg Louganis had on his way to becoming one of the world's top Olympic divers. Some topics discussed were Greg's childhood problems, his homosexuality, and him contracting the HIV virus.

name: To Kill a Priest
actor: Christopher Lambert, Ed Harris, Joss Ackland, Tim Roth
description: A young priest speaks out against the Communist regime in Poland and is killed for it.

name: Non-Stop
actor: Tomorowo Taguchi, Daiamondo Yukai, Shin'ichi Tsutsumi, Akaji Maro
description: A salaryman, a drug addict and a yakuza go on a breathless three man chase through the streets of Tokyo, each for a different reason and fighting demons.

name: Born Invincible
actor: Mei-Yi Chang, Chiu Chen, Pei Ling Chen, Shao Hua Chu
description: Two warlord chiefs, a ton-fa wielder who can destroy an opponents weapon and a Tai Chi expert that is impervious to weapons, send a pair of killers to track down and kill an old master swordsman who has given up fighting. When the killers assassination attempt is foiled by a group of kung fu students from a nearby school, the chiefs themselves come to the school to deal with the master swordsman and anyone else who gets in their way. When the schools head master dies defending the swordsman and his daughter, the schools 3 most senior students vow to avenge the deaths and begins a quest to annihilate the warlord chiefs. One by one, they end up facing a man so skilled in tai chi kung fu that it seems as if he were 'Born Invincible'.

name: The Naked Man
actor: Michael Rapaport, Michael Jeter, John Carroll Lynch, Arija Bareikis
description: A man takes matters into his own hands when a pharmaceutical kingpin moves into his town to cause some real trouble.

name: Love and Other Catastrophes
actor: Matt Day, Matthew Dyktynski, Alice Garner, Frances O'Connor
description: Two female students struggling to complete their university degrees seek a flatmate. At the same time Michael, a medical student, is looking for a new place to stay.

name: Chasing Ghosts: Beyond the Arcade
actor: Ronald Bailey, Sam Blackburn, Leo Daniels, Walter Day
description: 1982's Video Game World Champions share their philosophies on joysticks, groupies and life.

name: The Father
actor: Hossein Abedini, Mohammad Kasebi, Parivash Nazarieh, Hassan Sadeghi
description: Mehrollah is a 14-year-old boy who is forced to find a job to support his family after his father dies. He travels to the southern parts of Iran, looking for work. Upon his return to his hometown, he notices certain changes in his family.

name: The Quiet Room
actor: Celine O'Leary, Paul Blackwell, Chloe Ferguson, Phoebe Ferguson
description: A seven-year-old girl adopts a vow of silence in protest when her quarrelsome parents grow increasingly hostile to one another.

name: Two Much
actor: Antonio Banderas, Melanie Griffith, Daryl Hannah, Danny Aiello
description: A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.

name: The Legend of Galgameth
actor: Devin Oatway, Sean McNamara, Stephen Macht, Lou Wagner
description: A young prince fights to free his people with the help of his family mascot, a small dragon who grows upon eating metal.

name: City of Industry
actor: Harvey Keitel, Stephen Dorff, Timothy Hutton, Famke Janssen
description: Lee Egan lures his older brother Roy out of "retirement" with a sweet jewel heist, only to get killed by a backstabbing partner; then it's up to Roy to get revenge.

name: Double Team
actor: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Dennis Rodman, Mickey Rourke, Paul Freeman
description: Counter-terrorist Jack Quinn misses his target, Stavros, on the eve of his final mission. From there, he is sent to "The Colony", a rebirth for presumed-dead assassins. He breaks free from there, and seeks the aid of Yaz, a weapons dealer, for his final battle with Stavros.

name: The Alarmist
actor: David Arquette, Stanley Tucci, Kate Capshaw, Mary McCormack
description: Young Tommy Hudler decides to become a security systems salesman, and is an instant success. Everything seems to be going great until he discovers there's more to this business and his boss Heinrich than he previously suspected.

name: Another Nine & a Half Weeks
actor: Mickey Rourke, Agathe de La Fontaine, Angie Everhart, Steven Berkoff
description: When John travels to Paris to attend an art sale hosted by his old flame, he begins a torrid affair with a gorgeous woman (Angie Everhart) who used to be her best friend. As the erotic tension between them builds, John finds himself drawn into a dangerous new obsession.

name: Lake Placid
actor: Bill Pullman, Bridget Fonda, Oliver Platt, Brendan Gleeson
description: What happens when a man-eating crocodile begins picking off tourists in beautiful Lake Placid? What if the crocodile wants to make it his home?

name: Blue Collar
actor: Richard Pryor, Harvey Keitel, Yaphet Kotto, Ed Begley Jr.
description: Three workers, Zeke, Jerry and Smokey, are working at a car plant and drinking their beers together. One night when they steal away from their wives to have some fun they get the idea to rob the local union's bureau safe. First they think it is a flop, because they get only 600 dollars out of it, but then Zeke realizes that they also have gotten some 'hot' material. They decide to blackmail their union. The best reason for that is the union itself. All three are provoked by the fact that the union claims to have lost 10,000 dollars by their robbery.

name: Maniac Cop 2
actor: Robert Davi, Claudia Christian, Michael Lerner, Bruce Campbell
description: Officer Matt Cordell, the undead cop, returns from the grave. Again. This time he is after the criminals who murdered him in the prison, and he is not doing that because he wants to forgive them...

name: Welcome to Woop Woop
actor: Johnathon Schaech, Rod Taylor, Susie Porter, Dee Smart
description: A con artist escapes a deal gone wrong in New York and winds up in the Aussie outback in a strange town whose inhabitants are an oddball collection of misfits.

name: The Boys from Brazil
actor: Gregory Peck, Laurence Olivier, James Mason, Lilli Palmer
description: Barry Kohler, a young Nazi hunter, tracks down a group of former SS officers meeting in Paraguay in the late 1970s. The Nazis, led by Dr Mengele, are planning something. Old Nazi hunter, Ezra Lieberman, is at first uninterested in Kohler's findings. But when he is told something of their plan, he is eager to find out more. Lieberman visits several homes in Europe and the U.S. in order to uncover the Nazi plot. It is at one of these houses he notices something strange, which turns out to be a horrible discovery.

name: The Buddy Holly Story
actor: Gary Busey, Don Stroud, Charles Martin Smith, Conrad Janis
description: The musical career of rock and roll pioneer Buddy Holly is chronicled, from the days when "Peggy Sue" was "Cindy Lou", a song about his first girlfriend, to the meteoric run of "That'll Be the Day" up the charts, to his marriage, breakup with the Crickets, reunion with the Crickets, and untimely death.

name: The Brink's Job
actor: Peter Falk, Peter Boyle, Allen Garfield, Warren Oates
description: After a long spate of bad luck, the little criminal Tony and his gang successfully rob one of Brink's security transports, taking $30,000. Surprisingly their coup doesn't make the press. Curious Tony checks out their headquarters and finds out that their security standard is low beyond belief. Now a really big coup is prepared...

name: French Fried Vacation
actor: Josiane Balasko, Luis Rego, Marie-Anne Chazel, Michel Blanc
description: Holidaymakers arriving in a Club Med camp on the Ivory Coast are determined to forget their everyday problems and emotional disappointments. Games, competitions, outings, bathing and sunburn accompany a continual succession of casual affairs.

name: Safe Men
actor: Sam Rockwell, Steve Zahn, Michael Lerner, Paul Giamatti
description: Two untalented singers are mistaken for a pair of major league safe crackers in Providence, Rhode Island. The two are pressed into service by the local hoodlums and quickly find themselves in conflict with their professional colleagues. Romantic interest is added by the daughter of the underworld leader who won't date the men she knows are gangsters.

name: Rush Hour
actor: Ken Leung, Jackie Chan, Tom Wilkinson, Tzi Ma
description: Cultures clash and tempers flares as the two cops named Detective Inspector Lee a Hong Kong Detective and Detective James Carter FBI, a big-mouthed work-alone Los Angeles cop who are from different worlds discovers one thing in common: they can't stand each other. With time running out, they must join forces to catch the criminals and save the eleven-year-old Chinese girl of the Chinese consul named Soo Yung.

name: The Hexer
actor: Michal Zebrowski, Olaf Lubaszenko, Tomasz Sapryk, Zbigniew Zamachowski
description: The adventures of Geralt of Rivea, "The Witcher".

name: Fraternity Demon
actor: Trixxie Bowie, Charles Laulette, Deborah Carlin, Al Darrouch
description: Some college kids accidently unleash a sex demon and she ends up turning a frat party inside out.

name: Outside Providence
actor: Shawn Hatosy, Tommy Bone, Samantha Lavigne, Jonathan Brandis
description: A boy from Pawtucket, Rhode Island, caught up in the drug scene of the mid-70s, gets in trouble one too many times with the law. To stave off a jail term, his father arranges for him to be placed into a prep school in Cornwall, Connecticut. The terms: Graduate, or else.

name: Seven Years Bad Luck
actor: Max Linder, Alta Allen, Ralph McCullough, Betty K. Peterson
description: After breaking a mirror in his home, superstitious Max tries to avoid situations which could bring bad luck-- but in doing so, causes himself the worst luck imaginable.

name: California Suite
actor: Jane Fonda, Alan Alda, Maggie Smith, Michael Caine
description: Four totally different and separate stories of guests staying at the Beverly Hills Hotel. Maggie Smith and Michael Caine come from England to attend the Oscars; Jane Fonda comes from New York, Alan Alda is her ex who lives in California; in the slapstick part Bill Cosby, Richard Pryor and their wives come to the hotel to relax and play tennis, only to find there is only one room vacant; in the fourth segment Walter Matthau arrives a day before his wife for his nephew's Bar Mitzvah while his brother (Herb Edelman) sends a prostitute to his room.

name: Ira & Abby
actor: Chris Messina, David Margulies, Spiro Malas, Kali Rocha
description: A hastily married couple quickly devolve into a life of affairs, meddling parents, and therapy.

name: Carnosaur 3: Primal Species
actor: Scott Valentine, Janet Gunn, Rick Dean, Anthony Peck
description: International terrorists are terrified when their hijacked cargo turns out to be genetically engineered dinosaurs. Now... the army commando team attempting recovery of this secret cargo is about to make the same deadly discovery!

name: Inspector Gadget
actor: Matthew Broderick, Rupert Everett, Joely Fisher, Michelle Trachtenberg
description: A remake of the television series, Matthew Broderick stars as Gadget, who suffers an accident at the beginning of the film, and befriends Brenda, a robotic surgeon who repairs Gadget so that he can defeat the villain Claw. In the meantime, Gadget and Brenda fall in love.

name: Twin Sitters
actor: Peter Paul, David Paul, Christian Cousins, Joseph Cousins
description: An evil business executive (played by George Lazenby), is releasing dangerous toxins and the Barbarian Brothers set out to stop his evil work.

name: Mr. Accident
actor: Yahoo Serious, Helen Dallimore, David Field, Grant Piro
description: A very clumsy man and his UFO-obsessed girlfriend discover a plan made by his boss to market eggs laced with nicotine.

name: Nice Guys Sleep Alone
actor: Michael Greene, Sean O'Bryan, Susannah Cranage, Blake Steury
description: A young man in Louisville sees his dating failures are related to his always being nice. All of his dates end up going with the rude, obnoxious guys. Deciding to change his ways, he goes after a new acquaintance, who unfortunately is tired of the male bores she meets and is seeking Mr. Right - the rose-bearing guy who wants to be nice to her.

name: Cast Away
actor: Paul Sanchez, Lari White, Leonid Citer, David Allen Brooks
description: A man is marooned on an island after his plane crashes into the ocean. Far away from home, his girlfriend, and any human contact, he engages in a battle of wits with himself as he is tested mentally, physically, and emotionally in order to survive.

name: CHiPs '99
actor: Larry Wilcox, Erik Estrada, Robert Pine, Paul Korver
description: Ponch has returned to the police force, and is determined to help his friend Jon in investigating various car thefts.

name: Contract Killer
actor: Jet Li, Eric Tsang, Simon Yam, Gigi Leung
description: Financially troubled, a newbie hitman reluctantly takes the job of finding the plotted killer of a Japanese tycoon, but things complicate when the tycoon is killed and he is forced to ally with a misfortunate hitman to find the "King of the Hitman."

name: The Poker House
actor: Jennifer Lawrence, Javon Johnson, Sophi Bairley, Bokeem Woodbine
description: A dramatization of Lori Petty's teenage years spent in small town Iowa.

name: The Wounds
actor: Dusan Pekic, Milan Maric, Dragan Bjelogrlic, Branka Katic
description: This film follows two Belgrade youths on their rise to gangster legends in a decaying society.

name: The Guy from Harlem
actor: Loye Hawkins, Cathy Davis, Patricia Fulton, Wanda Starr
description: Tough streetwise private investigator Al Connors, who works in Florida but originally hails from Harlem, is hired by the CIA to guard a visiting African princess. Moreover, Connors uses all his sharp street smarts and fierce fighting skills to find another woman who's been abducted by the evil Big Daddy.

name: Hitman Hart: Wrestling with Shadows
actor: Bret Hart, Owen Hart, Brian Pillman, Blade Hart
description: The life and career of Bret Hart is recounted from his youth, through the start of his career, his years in the WWF, up to the present day. Bret discusses the high and lows of his career and shows the world of professional wrestling from a wrestler's point of view.

name: On the Ropes
actor: Sam Doumit, Martin Goldman, Harry Keitt, Randy Little
description: The story of three young boxers and their coach who is determined to guide them in a positive direction in and out of the ring.

name: The Adventures of Tom Thumb & Thumbelina
actor: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Elijah Wood, Peter Gallagher, Alexandra Boyd
description: When two tiny people reunite fifteen years after their village was ransacked by a giant, they learn that they were very special people in the village.

name: The Boys in Company C
actor: Stan Shaw, Andrew Stevens, James Canning, Michael Lembeck
description: This war drama (which prefigures the later "Full Metal Jacket") follows the lives of five young Marine inductees from their training in boot camp in 1967 through a tour in Vietnam in 1968 that quickly devolves into a hellish nightmare. Disheartened by futile combat, appalled by the corruption of their South Vietnamese ally, and constantly endangered by the incompetence of their own company commander, the young men find a possible way out of the war. They are told that if they can defeat a rival soccer team, they can spend the rest of their tour playing exhibition games behind the lines. But as they might have predicted, nothing in Vietnam is as simple as it seems.

name: The Cat from Outer Space
actor: Ken Berry, Sandy Duncan, Harry Morgan, Roddy McDowall
description: A UFO is stranded on earth and impounded by the US government. Its pilot, a cat with a collar that has special powers, including the ability to allow the cat to communicate with humans, has eluded the authorities and needs the help of a man named Frank in order to reclaim and repair his ship to get back home.

name: The Cat and the Canary
actor: Honor Blackman, Michael Callan, Edward Fox, Wendy Hiller
description: When an elderly man dies, some of his relatives gather to hear the reading of the will. When it is read by his attorney, the old man lets it be known how much he despised and loathed his worthless kin. As a result, his will is structured in such a way as to set up a dogfight between his potential heirs as to who will collect his fortune.

name: Restaurant
actor: Adrien Brody, Elise Neal, David Moscow, Simon Baker
description: A few young waiters at a popular New Jersey restaurant are dreaming of becoming actors or otherwise getting into the artistic community.

name: The Cheap Detective
actor: Peter Falk, Ann-Margret, Eileen Brennan, Sid Caesar
description: Lou Peckinpaugh, the Cheap detective has entered a world that is half Casablanca and half Maltese Falcon. A parody of Bogart's films in which Lou goes through a series of scenes from the two movies trying to keep ahead of the police who think he killed his partner and find the black bird.

name: Welcome to Happiness
actor: Kyle Gallner, Olivia Thirlby, Nick Offerman, Keegan-Michael Key
description: A children's book author is the gatekeeper to a mysterious door in his closet that only allows certain people to enter. When he learns where the door leads, his life is forever changed.

name: Kiss
actor: Rufus Collins, Johnny Dodd, Fred Herko, Mark Lancaster
description: Close-ups of couples kissing for three minutes each.

name: Jigoku no banken: akai megane
actor: Shigeru Chiba, Machiko Washio, Hideyuki Tanaka, Hideyo Amamoto
description: A surreal science fiction noir involving a man trapped in a future where seemingly everyone is a government spy and all-night noodle stands are outlawed.

name: Backyard Dogs
actor: Scott Hamm, Bree Turner, Walter Jones, Roger Fan
description: Two teenage boys aspire to win a backyard wrestling championship and a chance to appear on a national TV show.

name: Dead Rising: Watchtower
actor: Jesse Metcalfe, Meghan Ory, Virginia Madsen, Keegan Connor Tracy
description: A group of people fight to survive in a zombie infested town.

name: The Deep End
actor: Tilda Swinton, Goran Visnjic, Jonathan Tucker, Peter Donat
description: With her husband perpetually away at work, a mother raises her children virtually alone. Her teenage son is testing the waters of the adult world, and early one morning she wakes to find the dead body of his gay lover on the beach of their rural lakeside home. What would you do? What is rational and what do you do to protect your child? How far do you go and when do you stop?

name: Rennie's Landing
actor: Charlotte Ayanna, Ethan Embry, Peter Facinelli, Scott Foley
description: Fate reuintes college friends a year after graduation and they decide to recapture the idealistic spirit of their college days.

name: Scooby-Doo and the Alien Invaders
actor: Scott Innes, Mary Kay Bergman, Frank Welker, B.J. Ward
description: A cosmic case of UFOs, intergalactic intrigue and out-of-this-world romance launches Scooby, Shaggy and the Mystery, Inc. kids into their most unearthly adventure ever!

name: Boycott
actor: Jeffrey Wright, Terrence Howard, CCH Pounder, Carmen Ejogo
description: Black Americans boycott the public buses during the 1950s civil rights movement.

name: America's Sweethearts
actor: Julia Roberts, Billy Crystal, Catherine Zeta-Jones, John Cusack
description: In the midst of a nasty public breakup of married movie stars, a studio publicist scrambles to put a cap on the escalating situation as the couple's latest film has found its only print kidnapped by the director.

name: Anything But Love
actor: Andrew McCarthy, Isabel Rose, Cameron Bancroft, Alix Korey
description: A corporate lawyer is caught in a love triangle with an ambitious cabaret singer.

name: The Ringer
actor: Johnny Knoxville, Brian Cox, Katherine Heigl, Jed Rees
description: This comedy is about two guys who decide to rig the Special Olympics to pay off a debt by having one of them, Steve (Knoxville), pose as a contestant in the games, hoping to dethrone reigning champion, Jimmy. Mentally-challenged high jinks and hilarity surely follow.

name: Ditto
actor: Ji-tae Yu, HaNeul Kim, Ji-won Ha, Seung-min Lee
description: Two students, separated in time, are somehow able to talk to each other using amateur radio, one in 1979 and the other in 2000.

name: The Deal
actor: David Morrissey, Matt Blair, Michael Sheen, Dexter Fletcher
description: Follows the rise to power of Tony Blair, and his friendship and rivalry with his contemporary, Gordon Brown.

name: Avenging Angelo
actor: Sylvester Stallone, Madeleine Stowe, Anthony Quinn, Raoul Bova
description: A woman who has recently discovered that she is the daughter of Angelo, a major mafia boss, decides to wreak vengeance when he is killed by a hitman. She's aided by his faithful bodyguard, with whom she soon falls in love.

name: Mickey
actor: Harry Connick Jr., Shawn Salinas, Michelle Johnson, Mike Starr
description: A widowed lawyer wanted by the IRS assumes a new identity and signs his now-too-old son up for one more year of Little League. However, this may have been a mistake, as his son's dominance captures the media's attention as his team careens toward the Little League World Series.

name: The Skulls II
actor: Robin Dunne, Nathan West, Ashley Tesoro, Lindy Booth
description: After joining the Skulls, Ryan Sommers (Robin Dunne) is warned not to betray any secrets about the organization or its high-powered members. However, when Ryan witnesses a murder within the Skulls' private chambers, he finds that the closer he gets to revealing the truth - the more dangerous life becomes.

name: Black River
actor: Jay Mohr, Lisa Edelstein, Ann Cusack, Ron Canada
description: A writer visits a town that isn't what it appears to be.

name: The Barber
actor: Malcolm McDowell, Jeremy Ratchford, Garwin Sanford, Brenda James
description: A weary town faces a long, dark winter.

name: Joe and Max
actor: Til Schweiger, Leonard Roberts, Richard Roundtree, David Paymer
description: True story of boxers Joe Louis and Max Schmeling and their enduring friendship.

name: Lathe of Heaven
actor: James Caan, Lukas Haas, Lisa Bonet, David Strathairn
description: In a near future society a man claims that his dreams physically change reality. His therapist is confused at first but soon decides to use him for his own gain.

name: VeggieTales: The Ultimate Silly Song Countdown
actor: Kurt Heinecke, Mike Nawrocki, Laura Richey, Nancy Rizzo
description: The Pirates Who Don't Do Anything host this obviously silly song countdown. These are the 10 most popular songs, as tabulated on the VeggieTales website, and are presented in a very appealing fashion. As always, the computer animation is top-notch and the songs are definitely silly.

name: Wheelmen
actor: Lisa Arturo, James Avery, Elya Baskin, Jim Beaver
description: Great combination of a comedy and a feel good movie. There is never a dull moment in Wheelmen.

name: Imagining Argentina
actor: Irene Escolar, Fernando Tielve, Hector Bordoni, Antonio Banderas
description: Antonio Banderas and Emma Thompson star in this gripping political thriller about a man with the power to see the fate of missing people - with the exception of his own beloved wife.

name: End Game
actor: Cuba Gooding Jr., Angie Harmon, James Woods, Patrick Fabian
description: A secret Service agent and a news reporter investigate the conspiracy behind the assassination of the President.

name: The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
actor: Daniel Letterle, Diego Serrano, Shanola Hampton, David Monahan
description: A young gay man tries to balance his career as a personal assistant while searching for love.

name: Blissfully Yours
actor: Kanokporn Tongaram, Min Oo, Jenjira Pongpas, Sa-gnad Chaiyapan
description: The story of a love affair that begins during a picnic on the Thai-Burmese border.

name: The House Is Black
actor: Forugh Farrokhzad, Ebrahim Golestan, Hossein Mansouri
description: Set in a leper colony in the north of Iran, The House is Black juxtaposes "ugliness," of which there is much in the world as stated in the opening scenes, with religion and gratitude.

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
actor: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Gerry Robert Byrne, Elijah Wood
description: A man, Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend Clementine underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realizes that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.

name: Mail Order Bride
actor: Danny Aiello, Robert Capelli Jr., Ivana Milicevic, Artie Lange
description: When Toni discovers several of his men have been scammed by a Russian mail-order bride who?s escaped back to Russia, he decides to send his troublesome nephew, Anthony Santini to bring back the girl and the money. Only, Anthony Santini can?t seem to get the mob thing right.

name: The Maidens' Conspiracy
actor: Casper Zafer, Esther Nubiola, Leonor Watling, Ingrid Rubio
description: Tirante the knight is as committed to fighting the Turks in Constantinople as he is to relieving Carmesina, the heiress to the Byzantine Empire, of her virginity.

name: Dopamine
actor: John Livingston, Sabrina Lloyd, Bruno Campos, Rueben Grundy
description: Rand, Winston, and Johnson have a small tech startup company in the Bay Area that's developing a artificially-lived computer character, Koy Koy the bird, who can hear and see and interact with the user. Koy Koy gets placed in a kids schoolroom for testing, and Rand develops a relationship with one of the teachers, Sarah. Rand learns that his scientific understanding of human mating isn't necessarily a roadmap for the real thing.

name: Blood and Bone
actor: Michael Jai White, Julian Sands, Eamonn Walker, Dante Basco
description: In Los Angeles, an ex-con takes the underground fighting world by storm in his quest to fulfill a promise to a dead friend.

name: Masai: The Rain Warriors
actor: Ngotiek Ole Mako, Paul Nteri Ole Sekenan, Parkasio Ole Muntet, Musurpei Ole Toroge
description: After a lion kills the village leader, the expected rains fail to arrive, so a group of warriors are sent to hunt the lion down and kill it in hopes that the rains will come at last.

name: I Heart Huckabees
actor: Jason Schwartzman, Isabelle Huppert, Dustin Hoffman, Lily Tomlin
description: Determined to solve the coincidence of seeing the same conspicuous stranger three times in a day, Albert hires a pair of existentialist detectives, who insist on spying on his everyday life while sharing their views on life and the nature of the universe.

name: Live Forever
actor: Noel Gallagher, Liam Gallagher, Damon Albarn, Jarvis Cocker
description: Hilarous documentary about the Britpop music scene in the Nineties, featuring all the main bands of the scene exposing the truth behind the myths.

name: Notre musique
actor: Sarah Adler, Nade Dieu, Rony Kramer, Simon Eine
description: "Notre Music" is divided in three kingdoms: Hell, Purgatory and Paradise like in the Dante's Inferno in the Divine Comedy. Hell shows footages of many wars; Purgatory mixes reality and fiction in Sarajevo; and Paradise is a surrealistic view of a beach "protected" by the American Marines.

name: Valiant
actor: Ewan McGregor, Ricky Gervais, Tim Curry, Jim Broadbent
description: Set in 1944, Valiant is a woodland pigeon who wants to become a great hero someday. When he hears they are hiring recruits for the Royal Homing Pigeon Service, he immediately sets out for London. On the way, he meets a smelly but friendly pigeon named Bugsy, who joins him, mainly to get away from clients he cheated in a game of find-the pebble, and helps him sign up for the war.

name: Death of a Dynasty
actor: Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Capone Lee, Loon, Robert Stapleton
description: A young journalist, David Katz, who writes for a hip-hop magazine called "Mic Check", starts following a music mogul around as part of a story and over time incorrectly starts to think he is part of that world, which leads to him writing an article for a gossip newspaper that starts a rivalry between the producer and his most famous rapper.

name: Bigger Than the Sky
actor: Marcus Thomas, John Corbett, Amy Smart, Sean Astin
description: After being dumped by his girlfriend, a man stuck in a deadend life decides to audition for a small role in a local community theatre's production of Cyrano de Bergerac. Despite having no experience as an actor, he lands the lead role, which wreaks havoc upon his life.

name: Long Gone
actor: Jessie, Horizontal John, Joshua Long Gone, New York Slim
description: Documentary about 6 tramps who hop trains in America.

name: Dating Games People Play
actor: Austin Peck, Leslie Bega, Stefan Marc, Stephanie Brown
description: Nick Jenkins finds himself back in the single scene as his relationship with his fiancee abruptly fall apart. With his roommate and best friend Jed Rollins, Nick jumps into the dating world. Mona, Jed, and Robin accompany him as they meander throught the quagmire of awkward situations they encounter on their dating escapades.

name: Goldfish Memory
actor: Sean Campion, Flora Montgomery, Stuart Graham, Jean Butler
description: A light-hearted look at the dangers and delights of dating in contemporary Dublin

name: Bill Burr: I'm Sorry You Feel That Way
actor: Bill Burr
description: Bill Burr, comedian, holds a show in front of an audience.

name: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century
actor: Gil Gerard, Pamela Hensley, Erin Gray, Henry Silva
description: In 1987, Captain William "Buck" Rogers pilots his space shuttle on a mission but a meteor storm freezes him into an orbit that returns him to Earth 500 years later. In the year 2491, his shuttle is found and captured by the Draconian flagship, under the command of Princess Ardala and her henchman Kane. Reviving him, they return him to Earth after planting a homing beacon aboard his shuttle to track a path through Earth's defense barrier. Now, Buck Rogers must adjust to the 25th century, and convince the Terrans that the Draconians are planning to conquer Earth.

name: Slasher
actor: Christin Ackerman, Emily Banks, Michael Bennett
description: A documentary on a stereotypically shady used car salesman, one who convinces customers to buy vehicles that others have deemed unfit for sale.

name: China 9, Liberty 37
actor: Warren Oates, Fabio Testi, Jenny Agutter, Sam Peckinpah
description: Condemned gunman Clayton is given a last minute reprieve on condition he murders rancher Matthew for a railway company. Visiting Matthew's ranch, Clayton is unable to bring himself to kill Matthew and leaves, but Matthew's wife, Catherine, believing she has killed Matthew during an argument joins Clayton. Matthew, still alive, and mad as hell joins Clayton's equally angered employers to hunt down the pair

name: Damien: Omen II
actor: William Holden, Lee Grant, Jonathan Scott-Taylor, Robert Foxworth
description: Seven years later, 13-year-old Damien is just discovering who he really is, and what he is destined to do. Now living with his Aunt, Uncle, and cousin in a wealthy suburb of Chicago, Damien is anxious to inherit everything. Can Richard Thorn finish the job that Damien's father (Ambassador Thorn) started?

name: Max and Mona
actor: Mpho Lovinga, Jerry Mofokeng, Percy Matsemela, Thumi Melamu
description: Max Bua leaves his country life behind in hopes of becoming a doctor in Johannesburg, though the big city has different plans for him.

name: Synecdoche, New York
actor: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Catherine Keener, Sadie Goldstein, Tom Noonan
description: Theater director Caden Cotard is mounting a new play. Fresh off of a successful production of Death of a Salesman, he has traded in the suburban blue-hairs and regional theater of Schenectady for the cultured audiences and bright footlights of Broadway. Armed with a MacArthur grant and determined to create a piece of brutal realism and honesty, something into which he can put his whole self, he gathers an ensemble cast into a warehouse in Manhattan's theater district. He directs them in a celebration of the mundane, instructing each to live out their constructed lives in a small mock-up of the city outside. As the city inside the warehouse grows, Caden's own life veers wildly off the tracks. The shadow of his ex-wife Adele, a celebrated painter who left him years ago for Germany's art scene, sneers at him from every corner. Somewhere in Berlin, his daughter Olive is growing up under the questionable guidance of Adele's friend, Maria. He's helplessly driving his marriage to actress Claire into the ground. Sammy Barnathan, the actor Caden has hired to play himself within the play, is a bit too perfect for the part, and is making it difficult for Caden to revive his relationship with the alluringly candid Hazel. Meanwhile, his therapist, Madeline Gravis, is better at plugging her best-seller than she is at counselling him. His second daughter, Ariel, is disabled. And a mysterious condition is systematically shutting down each of his autonomic functions, one by one. As the years rapidly pass, Caden buries himself deeper into his masterpiece. Populating the cast and crew with doppelgangers, he steadily blurs the line between the world of the play and that of his own deteriorating reality. As he pushes the limits of his relationships, both personally and professionally, a change in creative direction arrives in Millicent Weems, a celebrated theater actress who may offer Caden the break he needs.

name: The Terminal
actor: Tom Hanks, Catherine Zeta-Jones, Stanley Tucci, Chi McBride
description: Victor Novarski reaches JFK airport from a politically unstable country. Due to collapse of his government ,his papers are no longer valid in the airport, and hence he is forced to stay in the airport till the war cools down. He makes the airport his home and develops a friendship with the people who work there until he finally has to leave.

name: I Like Killing Flies
actor: Michael Fishman, John A. Papa, Eve Shopsin, Kenny Shopsin
description: A documentary on the oddball Greenwich Village eatery, Shopsin's.

name: Peluca
actor: Jon Heder, Greg Hansen, Chris Sanchez, Bracken Johnson
description: A day in the life of Seth, super nerd extraordinaire; rocking the megalopolis of Preston, Idaho, and soon the world, with his illegal ninja moves and his sweet fanny pack. GOSH!!

name: Dead Girls
actor: Jessica Galang, Joseph Luis Caballero, Rebecca Mullins, Aubrey Joyce Tunnell
description: WRAPAROUND - Alice, a transient runaway who seeks refuge in a dark old house where she meets a most unusual young Girl with dark powers. OVER MY DEAD BODY - Suzy is a sweet young woman who gives her heart away too easily. Travis is a good timing young man whose cavalier attitude about a woman's heart is about to get him into serious trouble. When his former girlfriend shows up at his big open house party, Suzy can see Travis' true nature. But Travis, being a guy, tries to have his cake and eat it, too. Suzy won't share him with anyone. Travis tries to explain, accidentally killing Suzy. With a house full of guests and his old flame vying for his attention, Travis does what comes naturally and gets rid of the body. Only Suzy won't be gotten rid of so easily. THETA PHI'S NEVER DIE - Avery is a bright-eyed college student more focused on books and grades than boys and parties. When her Mother convinces her to rush for her old sorority, Theta Phi, Avery has no choice but to pursue life as a sorority sister. Theta Phi is the school's hottest, most exclusive sorority, and the current members aren't going to let a nerdy girl like Avery taint their image just because she's a legacy. The sisters stage a mock voodoo ceremony to scare Avery away. Only it goes horribly, horribly wrong. With Avery's dead body on their hands and jail in their future, the sisters dump the body and swear to a secret they will carry to their graves. VENGEANCE IS MINE - Maggie is a young woman who has been loyal to the faith all her life, even after the Parish priest began to sexually abuse her. Now that she's 18 and no longer holds any appeal to the good Father, she realizes what has happened. She prays for help, seeks the guidance of the Mother Superior, but no one will believe or listen to her. With no hope left, Maggie turns to someone she never considered before, and with his guidance, discovers it really is possible to get what she wants.

name: Tooken
actor: Lee Tergesen, Reno Wilson, Lauren Stamile, Joyce Bulifant
description: Tooken - The spoof on the popular Taken franchise.

name: The 12 Dogs of Christmas
actor: Jordan-Claire Green, Tom Kemp, Susan Wood, Adam Hicks
description: A girl who uses dogs to teach people about the true meaning of Christmas during the Depression.

name: China 9, Liberty 37
actor: Warren Oates, Fabio Testi, Jenny Agutter, Sam Peckinpah
description: Condemned gunman Clayton is given a last minute reprieve on condition he murders rancher Matthew for a railway company. Visiting Matthew's ranch, Clayton is unable to bring himself to kill Matthew and leaves, but Matthew's wife, Catherine, believing she has killed Matthew during an argument joins Clayton. Matthew, still alive, and mad as hell joins Clayton's equally angered employers to hunt down the pair

name: Corvette Summer
actor: Mark Hamill, Annie Potts, Eugene Roche, William Bryant
description: Ken loves to design and build exotic cars. When the High School shop class project car, a fully tricked out dream Corvette, is stolen, he begins searching for it. His search leads him to Las Vegas, where Vanessa, a teenaged prostitute wannabe, helps him try to track it down.

name: The Chant of Jimmie Blacksmith
actor: Tommy Lewis, Freddy Reynolds, Ray Barrett, Jack Thompson
description: The true story of a part aboriginal man who finds the pressure of adapting to white culture intolerable, and as a result snaps in a violent and horrific manner.

name: Comes a Horseman
actor: James Caan, Jane Fonda, Jason Robards, George Grizzard
description: Ella Connors is a single woman who gets pressured to sell her failing cattle farm to her corrupt ex suitor, Jacob Ewing. She asks for help from her neighbor, Frank Athearn. As Ella and Frank fight back through stampedes, jealousy, betrayal, and sabotage...they eventually find love.

name: Checking Out
actor: Peter Falk, Laura San Giacomo, David Paymer, Judge Reinhold
description: A famed stage actor reunites his family for a party, and plans to commit suicide after-wards, unless they are able to convince him not to.

name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
actor: Daniel Radcliffe, Michael Gambon, Dave Legeno, Elarica Gallacher
description: In the sixth year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft, and in both wizard and muggle worlds Lord Voldemort and his henchmen are increasingly active. With vacancies to fill at Hogwarts, Professor Dumbledore persuades Horace Slughorn, back from retirement to become the potions teacher, while Professor Snape receives long awaited news. Harry Potter, together with Dumbledore, must face treacherous tasks to defeat his evil nemesis.

name: Junebug
actor: Embeth Davidtz, David Kuhn, Alessandro Nivola, Alicia Van Couvering
description: Successful Carolinian George Johnsten meets Chicago art gallery owner Madeleine at an electoral benefit art auction- love at first sight. Madeleine decides to meet a Southern original artist, so George seizes the opportunity to come along and present her to his North Carolina parents Eugene and Peg, drop-out brother Johny and his high-pregnant wife Ashley. Confronting the outsider soon opens a can of worms as emotions revive or emerge, like admiration and jealousy.

name: Big Momma's House 2
actor: Martin Lawrence, Nia Long, Emily Procter, Zachary Levi
description: Undercover Agent Malcolm Turner is back and this time he's out to expose the suspected designer of a deadly computer "worm" that would allow outside forces access to sophistical and critical government intelligence files. But unfortunately, the only way the crafty agent can get next to the worm's creator, Tom Fuller, is to access the programmer's Orange County home as the new "nanny" to Fuller and his wife Leah's children: toddler Andrew and his two older sisters, Carrie and Molly. This means that Malcolm must once again rely on his sure-fire alter ego, the take-no-prisoners Hattie Mae Pierce, a.k.a. "Big Momma," to bring down the bad guys and prove that a woman's work is never done! But once undercover, the job proves another tough juggling act for Big Momma as "she" must manage the hectic lives of the three Fuller kids, keep up with their myriad of daily activities, and handle the many household chores, all while secretly trying to dig up information on Tom's computer virus. Of course, Malcolm's hardest and most comical task is staying in Big Momma character throughout, which requires the trickiest of physical and vocal transformations, not to mention the ability to think really fast on his pumps. Hilarious situations ensue for "Big Momma" while trying to trap her prey, including, infiltrating a ritzy women's day spa, leading a bawdy teen cheerleading competition, and surviving a crazy jet ski chase, all while trying to keep "her" wig straight and skirts smooth. Along the way, "Big Momma" also helps bring the fractured Fuller clan back together and, in turn, Malcolm develops a newfound appreciation for his own family, which includes stepson Trent and expectant pregnant wife Sherrie. Malcolm also learns he can strike a successful balance between his work and home responsibilities, without shortchanging either side in the process.

name: Kiss Me Again
actor: Stefano Accorsi, Vittoria Puccini, Pierfrancesco Favino, Claudio Santamaria
description: A look at the lives of Carlo, Giulia, and their friends some 10 years after the events of L'Ultimo bacio.

name: Days of Heaven
actor: Richard Gere, Brooke Adams, Sam Shepard, Linda Manz
description: Bill and Abby, a young couple who to the outside world pretend to be brother and sister are living and working in Chicago at the beginning of the century. They want to escape the poverty and hard labor of the city and travel south. Together with the girl Linda (who acts as the narrator in the movie) they find employment on a farm in the Texas panhandle. When the harvest is over the young, rich and handsome farmer invites them to stay because he has fallen in love with Abby. When Bill and Abby discover that the farmer is seriously ill and has only got a year left to live they decide that Abby will accept his wedding proposal in order to make some benefit out of the situation. When the expected death fails to come, jealousy and impatience are slowly setting in and accidents become eventually inevitable.

name: Mickey's Twice Upon a Christmas
director: Carole Holliday, Matthew O'Callaghan, Theresa Cullen
actor: Wayne Allwine, Tony Anselmo, Jeff Bennett, Jim Cummings
description: Mickey and the gang team up for a new holiday adventure and for the first time ever they are all computer animated. There will be five mini films that include: Belles on Ice, Christmas:Impossible, Christmas Maximus, Donald's Gift, Mickey's Dog-Gone Christmas

name: Jocks
actor: Scott Strader, Perry Lang, Mariska Hargitay, Richard Roundtree
description: The coach of a college tennis team is given an ultimatum: put together a winning team, or else.

name: All Souls Day: Dia de los Muertos
actor: Marisa Ramirez, Travis Wester, Nichole Hiltz, Laz Alonso
description: During a Day of the Dead celebration, the dead come to life to prey upon the living.

name: Category 6: Day of Destruction
actor: Thomas Gibson, Nancy McKeon, Chandra West, Brian Markinson
description: Tornado in Las Vegas. Heat in Chicago. Hail in Illinois. A snowfall and a storm force flows towards Chicago. It's just the beginning of a series of weather anomalies. The lights go off. People panic. A few courageous people are trying to solve the riddle of the infuriated nature and prevent mass destruction.

name: Dragons: A Fantasy Made Real
actor: Paul Hilton, Katrine Bach, Aidan Woodward, Tom Chadbon
description: An alternate scientific history, in which dragons were real and lived on this earth, is imagined in this fantasy docudrama. Dr. Tanner, a modern but renegade scientist, hopes to prove the existence of the creatures by discovering paleontologic evidence.

name: Rock School
actor: Napoleon Murphy Brock, Asa Spades Collins, Tucker Collins, Madi Diaz-Svalgard
description: At the real life School of Rock a group of misfit kids get in touch with their inner rock star.

name: Behind the Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon
actor: Nathan Baesel, Angela Goethals, Robert Englund, Scott Wilson
description: The next great psycho horror slasher has given a documentary crew exclusive access to his life as he plans his reign of terror over the sleepy town of Glen Echo, all the while deconstructing the conventions and archetypes of the horror genre for them.

name: The Deer Hunter
actor: Robert De Niro, John Cazale, John Savage, Christopher Walken
description: Michael, Steven and Nick are young factory workers from Pennsylvania who enlist into the Army to fight in Vietnam. Before they go, Steven marries the pregnant Angela, and their wedding party also serves as the men's farewell party. After some time and many horrors, the three friends fall in the hands of the Vietcong and are brought to a prison camp in which they are forced to play Russian roulette against each other. Michael makes it possible for them to escape, but they soon get separated again.

name: Fei du juan yun shan
actor: Jackie Chan, Peng Cheng, Kuo Chung Ching, Fang Fang
description: A local Kung Fu expert is hired to form a team of guards to escort an dying man to a doctor. In order that they reach the doctor in time, they must pass through the "Stormy Hills", which are plagued by bandits, savages, evil monks are more.

name: The Fourth World War
actor: Michael Franti, Suheir Hammad
description: This documentary takes a polemical look at the trouble between Israelis and Palestinians.

name: Game Over
actor: Reino Nordin, Julius Lavonen, Juuso Pekkinen, Jarkko Niemi
description: A movie inspired by a true crime - the coldblooded Heino double murder, committed by a group of teenagers, that shocked Finland in 2001.

name: Five Deadly Venoms
actor: Kuo Chue, Philip Kwok, Chien Sun, Sheng Chiang
description: A dying teacher instructs his final student to check on the activities of five former pupils, each of whom he taught a unique and special style of kung-fu to: The Centipede, Snake, Scorpion, Lizard, and Toad (hence the title). His final student, who knows a little of each style must team up with one of the other good students to destroy the evil ones if there are any. Greed and treachery ensue as the student discovers that some of the students are indeed evil. But which one can he trust enough to team up with?

name: The Good Sister
actor: Sonya Walger, Ben Bass, Bobbie Phillips, Ashleigh Harrington
description: The Good Sister follows a couple who is working to put their crumbling marriage back together, when the wife receives a letter informing her that she has a long-lost twin sister. First thinking that the new family member will bring the couple closer together, the husband then begins an affair with the sister and discovers that she is treacherous and dangerous.

name: Richard Jeni: A Big Steaming Pile of Me
actor: Richard Jeni
description: Filmed Live at the Irvine Barclay Theatre in Irvine, California.

name: Journey to the Edge of the Universe
actor: Alec Baldwin, Sean Pertwee
description: A journey through space and time.

name: Death Ride
actor: Rand Gamble, Hinano Yoshikawa, Laura Putney, Adrian Roberts
description: The photographer Greg Ross has an argument with his wife Amanda about his affair with the Japanese model Yumi and he accidentally kills her. He decides to get rid off Amanda's body dumping it in the Black Lake. While driving in a road during the night, Greg recalls moments of his relationship with Amanda and Yumi and is haunted by their ghosts, driving him insane with a tragic conclusion.

name: September
actor: Denholm Elliott, Dianne Wiest, Mia Farrow, Elaine Stritch
description: Everyone is gathering at Lane's place for the weekend, and everyone's in love. Unfortunately, each beloved loves somebody else, and no one seems to realize it.

name: Lady in the Water
actor: Paul Giamatti, Bryce Dallas Howard, Jeffrey Wright, Bob Balaban
description: Cleveland Heep, a stuttering apartment superintendent, encounters a girl named Story swimming in the complex's pool. He soon learns that she comes from the Blue World, and has a message for mankind. Will he be able to help her complete her mission?

name: Penny Dreadful
actor: Rachel Miner, Mimi Rogers, Chad Todhunter, Mickey Jones
description: Young Penny goes on a retreat with her psychologist; the intention is to help her overcome her phobia, an intense fear of cars. Unexpected events find her in a nightmarish situation where her worst fears come true.

name: Snakeman
actor: Stephen Baldwin, Jayne Heitmeyer, Larry Day, Gary Hudson
description: Anthropologists deep in the Amazon uncover the remains of a man they come to determine was approximately 300-years old when he died. This leads to a second expedition to discover the reason behind his longevity, but there's a major problem in the form of an Amazonian tribe that guards the proverbial fountain of youth and the giant, five-headed snake they worship.

name: Lilo & Stitch 2: Stitch Has a Glitch
actor: Chris Sanders, Dakota Fanning, Tia Carrere, David Ogden Stiers
description: Taking place between the original "Lilo and Stitch" and "Stitch: The Movie", "Lilo and Stitch 2" finds the rowdy extraterrestrial getting used to life with his new ohana. However, a malfunction in the ultimate creation of Dr. Jumba soon emerges, which reinstates his destructive programming and threatens to both ruin his friendship with Lilo and to short him out for good!

name: Opa!
actor: Matthew Modine, Richard Griffiths, Alki David, Agni Scott
description: Deceptively sophisticated Eric arrives from Chicago on the Greek island of Patmos. He plans to continue his long-deceased father Phillip's quest for St. John the Evangelist's mythical cup near the dig run by old archaeology professor Tierrney, but now using ultra-modern scanning equipment. He soon locates it, but the problem is it's under the profitable tavern of widely popular Katarina Gambierakis, who also won his heart.

name: Mentor
actor: Rutger Hauer, Matthew Davis, Dagmara Dominczyk, Susan Misner
description: A thought-provoking drama about the power that a famous university professor holds over his students and assistants.

name: Palo Alto, CA
actor: Aaron Ashmore, Johnny Lewis, Justin Mentell, Autumn Reeser
description: On their last night of Thanksgiving break, four old friends, now all college freshmen, realize their small town has more meaning than they ever imagined.

name: Push
actor: Colin Ford, Joel Gretsch, Djimon Hounsou, Dakota Fanning
description: A group of young American ex-pats with telekinetic and clairvoyant abilities are hiding from a clandestine U.S. government agency. They must utilize their different talents and band together for a final job enabling them to escape the agency forever.

name: Randy and the Mob
actor: Ray McKinnon, Walton Goggins, Lisa Blount, Tim DeKay
description: A good ol' boy (McKinnon) gets into trouble with some mobsters, and then must seek assistance from his estranged, identical twin gay brother.

name: Android Apocalypse
actor: Wendy Anderson, Scott Bairstow, Ian Black, Brian Dueck
description: In an age when Machines dominate the world, the fate of man rests in the hands of an outlaw and an android.

name: On the Road
actor: Sam Riley, Garrett Hedlund, Kristen Stewart, Amy Adams
description: Shaken by the death of his father and discouraged by his stalled career, writer Sal Paradise goes on a road trip hoping for inspiration. While traveling, he is befriended by charismatic and fearless Dean Moriarty and Moriarty's free-spirited and seductive young wife, Marylou. Traveling across the American southwest together, they strive to break from conformity and and search the unknown, and their decisions change the very course of their lives.

name: An Ox's Tale: The John Entwistle Story
director: Glenn Aveni, Steve Luongo, Jack Edward Sawyers
actor: Gordon Cotten, John Entwistle, Peter Frampton, Steve Luongo
description: An intimate portrait of the legendary bass guitarist for The Who. This documentary includes the last footage ever recorded with John Entwistle, and features interviews with Pete Townshend, as well as other major figures in rock history.

name: Touch the Top of the World
actor: Peter Facinelli, Jack Knight, Dawson Dunbar, Sarah Manninen
description: The story of the first blind man ever to reach the top of Mount Everest.

name: Miracle Dogs Too
actor: Janine Turner, Patrick Muldoon, Dustin Hunter Evans, Lesley Ann Warren
description: Zack, a young boy, finds two cocker spaniels caged in the woods and takes them home. The animals, Sissy and Buddy, have magical healing powers that change the people of a small town.

name: Dance Party, USA
actor: Cole Pensinger, Anna Kavan, Ryan White, Sarah Bing
description: Jessica and Gus, two apathetic teenagers, drift aimlessly from one day to the next until they meet each other. They make a tenuous and fleeting connection when Gus confides in Jessica about his dark past.

name: Reno 911!: Miami
actor: Lennie Loftin, Danny DeVito, Robert Ben Garant, Niecy Nash
description: A rag-tag team of Reno cops are called in to save the day after a terrorist attack disrupts a national police convention in Miami Beach during spring break. Based on the Comedy Central series.

name: Feel the Noise
actor: Rosa Arredondo, Luis Cruz, Melonie Diaz, Charles Duckworth
description: After a run-in with local thugs, aspiring Harlem rapper Rob flees to a place and father he never knew, and finds his salvation in Reggaeton, a spicy blend of hip-hop, reggae and Latin beats. Puerto Rico, the spiritual home of Reggaeton, inspires Rob and his step-brother Javi to pursue their dream of becoming Reggaeton stars. Together with a dancer named C.C., they learn what it means to stay true to themselves and each other, while overcoming obstacles in love, greed and pride, all culminating in an explosive performance at New York's Puerto Rican Day Parade.

name: Outlaw
actor: Sean Bean, Danny Dyer, Rupert Friend, Sean Harris
description: A group of people who feel betrayed by their government and let down by their police force form a modern-day outlaw posse in order to right what they see as the wrongs of society.

name: Without Evidence
actor: Scott Plank, Anna Gunn, Andrew Prine, Angelina Jolie
description: The story revolves around a possible conspiracy behind the real life murder of the Oregon's Head of Corrections Michael Francke.

name: The Legend of Secret Pass
actor: Zoe Axelrod, Shelley Berman, Michael Chiklis, David Cross
description: The 'Legend of Secret Pass' takes place in the mountains of the South West and involves Thunderbirds of Indian mythology and an animal refuge of mystical proportions. An unlikely troop of animals and humans are caught up in a clash of ageless magic. In this moment of crisis, the barest chance to avoid cataclysm falls into the hands of an Indian boy, Manu.

name: The Baker
actor: Damian Lewis, Kate Ashfield, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau, Dyfan Dwyfor
description: A hit man has second thoughts about his career and seeks refuge from his boss by finding work as a baker in a rural Welsh village.

name: Normal Adolescent Behavior
actor: Amber Tamblyn, Ashton Holmes, Kelli Garner, Daryl Sabara
description: In a suburb populated by wealthy and liberal parents who want a bucolic life for themselves and their children, Wendy, Billie and Ann are seniors at the alternative private school; they spend all their time with fellow students John, Price and Robert. The six have been friends since elementary school and their friendship has become a six-person monogamous relationship. They swap sex partners each week; their loyalty is to the group, not to one person. The six friends don't want to survive high school - they want to transcend its pettiness.
